Action:4
I will move up to explore the area above and see if there are any safes or timers I can use to increase my score and survival time.

The avatar is at (5, 13). There are boxes at (2, 3), (2, 6), (2, 20), (2, 23), (12, 3), (12, 6), (12, 20), (12, 23). There are monsters at (5, 21), (5, 22), (7, 18), (9, 5). The closest box is at (12, 13). I should go down to approach the box at (12, 13).
Action: 3
I will move down to approach the box at (12, 13).

The avatar is currently at (6, 13). There are monsters nearby to the east and south of the avatar, so I should move away from them. Moving up will allow me to avoid the monsters, and explore the map.
Action: 4
I will move up to avoid the monsters.

The avatar is at row=5, col=13. There are boxes at (2,3), (2,6), (2,20), (2,23), (12,3), (12,6), (12,20), (12,23). There are monsters nearby at (5,5), (3,18), (5,19), (7,22). The closest box is at (2,3), and moving up could lead to pushing it. However, there are monsters on row 5, so I should be careful. I'll move to the right to avoid the monsters first.

Action: 2
```Action: 2```
I'm moving right to avoid the monsters and potentially set up for pushing a box later.

The avatar is at (5, 14). There's a monster to the right at (5, 18). Boxes are at (2,3), (2,6), (2,20), (2,23), (12,3), (12,6), (12,20), (12,23). Walls surround the entire play area. My goal is to survive and maximize score by pushing boxes into safe zones. There are monsters nearby, so my immediate priority is to move away from them. I will move to the left, away from the monster.

Action: 1
```Action: 1```
I'm moving left to get away from the monster at (5,18).

The avatar is at row=5, col=13. There is a 'monsterNormal' at row=5, col=18. There are boxes scattered around. The closest box is at row 2, col 3. The 'timer' is not on the map. I will move up to avoid the monster.
Action: 4
I will move up to avoid the monster and explore the map.

The avatar is at (5,13). There is a monster at (5,17). To survive, I should move down to avoid the monster.
Action: 3
I'm moving down to avoid the monster.

The avatar is currently at (6, 13). There's a monster to the left and right of the avatar, and there are boxes in row 2 and 12 that could be used to push into safe.

Action:1
I will move to the left to avoid the monster at the right and hopefully find a safe spot or a box to push.

The avatar is currently at (6, 12). There are boxes at (2,3), (2,6), (2,20), (2,23), (12,3), (12,6), (12,20) and (12,23). The closest box is at (12, 12). There are monsters nearby at (5, 14), (6, 18), (7, 3), (9, 20). It's best to move away from the monster at (6,18). Let's move up.
Action: 4
I'm moving up to avoid the monster on the right.

The avatar is at row=5, col=12. There is a monsterNormal (represented by '#') at row=5, col=13. Moving right would lead to death. There are boxes at row 2, col 3 and row 2, col 6, and row 2, col 20, and row 2, col 23. There are also boxes at row 12 col 3, row 12 col 6, row 12 col 20, row 12 col 23. It is better to go up to avoid the monster and find the timer.
Action: 4
I will move up to avoid immediate danger from the monster to my right.

The avatar is at (5, 12). There's a monster to the right (5, 13). There are several boxes in the level. I will try to move to a safe location, and then analyze the box locations to see if I can push them to the 'safe' area. I will move up to get away from the monster first.
Action: 4
I will move up to get away from the monster.
